SELECT id, fileCount, emailAddress, title, regdate, esId, readYn, importantYn FROM ( SELECT e.id as id, fe.fileCount AS fileCount, e.SENDEREMAILADDRESS as emailAddress, e.title as title, e.regdate as regdate, es.id as esId, es.readYn as readYn, es.importantYn as importantYn, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY e.id DESC) AS rnum FROM EMAIL e LEFT JOIN ( select COUNT(*) AS fileCount, Email.ID from email join files on email.id = files.emailId GROUP BY Email.ID) fe ON E.ID = fe.ID JOIN EMAIL_STATE es ON e.ID = es.EMAILID WHERE es.EMAILUSERID IN ( SELECT id FROM EMAIL_ADDRESS_USER WHERE EMPLOYEEID = #{employeeId} ) AND es.HIDEYN = 'N' AND es.TRASHCANYN = 'N' ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
